properties.jcr:title: Ajisen Ramen
properties.shortdescription: Famous for its flavorful Tonkotsu broth extracted from pork bones, Ajisen Restaurant serves Tonkotsu ramen with extensive garnishing in its ramen line-ups.

properties.jcr:title: BALIthai
properties.shortdescription: BALI Thai Restaurant offers the best of both Thai and Indonesian cuisines. Serving some of the all-time favorites, our Tahu Telur is a must-try Indonesian appetizer.
Bober Tea
properties.jcr:title: Bober Tea
BURGER KING
properties.shortdescription: Burger King is a fast food joint with something for every meat lover, be it a chicken burger, fish burger, cheeseburger or the classic Burger King Whopper Burger.

Cafe O is a reinterpretation of the traditional Singapore coffee shops of days gone by. Enjoy your familiar Kopi-Siew-Tai, half boiled eggs, Roti Prata, Nasi Briyani and more in their traditional coffee shop setting.
properties.jcr:title: Cafe O

_rel_brandtenants_details.jcr:title: Chanko Oden 力士锦关东煮

properties.shortdescription: Immerse in the tantalizing world of Chanko Oden with traditional Japanese-style oden

_rel_tenants_details.jcr:title: Chanko Oden 力士锦关东煮

properties.jcr:title: Chanko Oden 力士锦关东煮

properties.shortdescription: Daun Pandan Rice Dumpling is a food kiosk that sells glutinous rice dumplings, with a variety of sumptuous fillings, wrapped and cooked in pandan leaves. From innovative flavors like Black Pepper Chicken to Kee Chang with Red Beans, indulge in this glutinous goodness today.
properties.jcr:title: Daun Pandan Rice Dumpling
Duke Bakery
properties.shortdescription: Duke Bakery has created over 60 different innovative kinds of delicious breads by ingeniously incorporating the Japanese style of light and soft bread textures together with the European style of baking using yeast from fermented fruits.

Retaining the original taste & flavor of yesteryears, EAT Restaurant offers local favourites at wallet-friendly prices. You can find local delights such as Minced Pork Noodle, Handmade Fishball Noodle, Laksa, Satay Beehoon and more. Certainly, EAT is the place to eat!
properties.jcr:title: EAT.

properties.shortdescription: Four Leaves is a bakery that provides innovative and quality breads, cake & pastries fresh out of the oven to our customers. Sink your teeth into fluffy buns, delightfully sweet strawberry shortcake & more!
properties.jcr:title: Four Leaves

properties.shortdescription: Fragrance Bak Kwa is 100% locally produced with no preservatives added. Fresh whole lean pork leg is used & marinated with 18 different traditional herbs to bring out the unique flavour of our Bak Kwa. Enjoy fragrance in every bite of this delicatessen.
properties.jcr:title: Fragrance

properties.shortdescription: Fu Lin Restaurant is synonymous with the freshest ingredients that make up the delectable dish - yong tau foo. Over at Fu Lin, there is a huge selection of ingredients for you to choose from, served in soup, dry or curry base.
properties.jcr:title: Fu Lin Fried Yong Tofu

_rel_brandtenants_details.jcr:title: Haidilao Hot Pot 海底捞火锅

properties.jcr:title: Haidilao Hot Pot 海底捞火锅
properties.shortdescription: Watch the chefs knead their homemade noodles right at your booths and taste the freshness of the succulent noodles that's perfect with the hearty spice-infused broth.

_rel_tenants_details.jcr:title: Haidilao Hot Pot 海底捞火锅
Haidilao Hot Pot 海底捞火锅
Haidilao Hot Pot 海底捞火锅

Haidilao Hot Pot 海底捞火锅

_rel_brandtenants_details.jcr:title: Hong Kong Egglet & Nam Kee JB Handmade Pau

properties.shortdescription: The food kiosk Hong Kong Egglet & Nam Kee JB Handmade Pau brings to you light bites of dimsum & the iconic Hong Kong street snack - the egglet. Choose from popular flavors like Original and Cheese or go for adventurous twists like the Pizza or Chilli Shrimp egglets.

_rel_tenants_details.jcr:title: Hong Kong Egglet & Nam Kee JB Handmade Pau

properties.jcr:title: Hong Kong Egglet & Nam Kee JB Handmade Pau

properties.shortdescription: If you love Japanese food, Ichiban Sushi is the ideal Japanese restaurant in Singapore to go to! Select from a huge variety of conveyor belt sushi, and quality set meals that won't leave a hole in your pocket.
properties.jcr:title: Ichiban Sushi
Jollibean
properties.shortdescription: The Jollibean food kiosk provides you with up to 50% of your recommended daily intake of calcium in a cup of Soy Milk! Pair our soy milk with other soy products like our Jolly Pancakes to enjoy a tasty, healthy snack.

Kopitiam is also known as the food court that houses all the iconic Singaporean hawker raves - Hainanese Chicken Rice, Laksa & many more local delicacies. With a selection as diverse as Singapore's multi-ethnic society, there is a dish for everyone.
properties.jcr:title: Kopitiam

properties.shortdescription: A simple greeting of LiHO is a great way for individuals to bond and it is even better with a cup of Singapore’s home grown tea brand, LiHO TEA.
properties.jcr:title: LiHO
Long Beach Seafood Restaurant
properties.shortdescription: Creators of the original Black Pepper Crab, Long Beach dishes up some of the best of Singapore's signature., such as Air-flown Live Alaskan King Crab, Air-flown Live Southern Australian Lobster and Australian King Crab. Head down to Long Beach Seafood Restaurant for a seafood spread!

properties.jcr:title: McDonald's
properties.shortdescription: When a fast food craving hits, McDonald's is the convenient solution. Try local favourites like McSpicy or McNuggets with the signature Curry Sauce, or all-time favourites like Big Mac & Filet-O-Fish. McCafe also offers a cuppa and dessert.
Enjoy wholesome and authentic Japanese meals, prepared daily with the freshest ingredients!
properties.jcr:title: MENDON

properties.shortdescription: Mr. Coconut
properties.jcr:title: Mr. Coconut
Old Chang Kee
properties.shortdescription: Famous for its curry puffs that are filled with perfectly spiced curry potatoes, chicken and egg, Old Chang Kee has expanded its menu to include a variety of finger foods & light bites that can curb those hunger pangs on the go!

properties.jcr:title: Ole Ole Singapore
properties.shortdescription: Ole Ole has over 500 types of chocolates ranging from liquor chocolate to chocolate biscuits. Choose from international brands such as Ferrero & Lindt for a sweet treat for everyone. There's also an exquisite selection of alcoholic beverages such as miniature liqueur collectibles & wines.

Pizza Hut Express is a fast service counter concept specially designed to serve busy professionals, students and all who are craving pizza or looking for a filling meal on the move. Savour the freshly baked Hand Stretched Thin sliced pizzas, & signature sides such as drumlets & garlic bread in just a couple of minutes.
properties.jcr:title: Pizza Hut Express

properties.shortdescription: If you love deep fried crispy Wanton with savory-sweet Charsiew BBQ Pork resting on a bowl of chewy sauce-drenched noodles, then Pontian Wanton Noodles is just the place to eat at! Share an extra plate of fried wantons around the table at this casual eatery.
properties.jcr:title: Pontian Mee
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen
properties.shortdescription: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen provides Louisiana style fried chicken. Our fresh chicken is marinated for 12 hours with our Louisiana recipe; served with melt in your mouth biscuits and unique signature sides of Mashed Potatoes, Coleslaw, Sweet Corn & Cajun Fries.

POT LUCK is a new restaurant concept by The Soup Restaurant that offers affordable and home-style ‘zichar dishes in claypots’ in a nostalgic old Chinatown setting. Customers can also help themselves to a continuous free flow of hot and cold beverages at $2.80 each, as well as rice at $1.50 per person.
properties.jcr:title: POT LUCK

properties.shortdescription: Cafe Red Ginger is dedicated to providing a comfortable & affordable gastronomical experience for big families & working professionals alike. We have a wide variety of local hawker fare that everyone's sure to love!
properties.jcr:title: Red Ginger
Saap Saap Thai
properties.shortdescription: Saap Saap Thai, a Halal Thai Restaurant, brings across the true essence of Thai Cuisine by featuring Authentic Street Side Fried Chicken, Stir Fried Rice Dishes with a twist, Thai Noodles served in aromatic, original Thai flavored broth with slices of meat cooked to perfection, Thai Boat Noodles and much more.

properties.jcr:title: Seoul Garden Hotpot
properties.shortdescription: Seoul Garden makes it its top priority to deliver Korean style hot pots of great nutritional values. Outlet @ CapitaLand mall - Bedok Mall & IMM.

properties.jcr:title: SF FRUITS
properties.shortdescription: SF fruits is a food kiosk that delivers superior quality cut fruits and fruit juices at a value-for-money price positioning.

Shihlin Taiwan Street Snacks is a food kiosk selling light bites. Featuring popular snacks from Taiwan's night markets such as XXL Crispy Chicken, Crispy Floss Egg Crepe, Handmade Oyster Mee Sua & Seafood Tempura, save a flight & take a bite!
properties.jcr:title: Shihlin Taiwan Street Snacks
Streats Hong Kong Cafe
properties.shortdescription: Streats Hong Kong Restaurant serves familiar everyday Hong Kong fare with an added twist - including local specialities such as sweet & sour dishes, hot plates and spicy curries. Besides that, a plethora of hot and cold beverages, special blends and desserts from the enticing menu would leave you dizzy with choices.

properties.jcr:title: Subway
properties.shortdescription: Subway is a fast food restaurant serving sandwiches, wraps and salads. Enjoy gourmet cold cut deli on herbs-infused bread with a generous serving of nutritious greens drizzled with decadent low fat dressings.

properties.jcr:title: Sushi Express
properties.shortdescription: Sushi Express is fast becoming the most recognisable sushi restaurant in Singapore for serving fresh, delicious sushi at affordable prices. Enjoy more than 60 sushi varieties with everything at $1.5++/plate!

_rel_brandtenants_details.jcr:title: Sweet Symphony Dessert / Xiang Duo Duo

_rel_tenants_details.jcr:title: Sweet Symphony Dessert / Xiang Duo Duo

properties.jcr:title: Sweet Symphony Dessert / Xiang Duo Duo
Swensen's
properties.shortdescription: Satisfy your cravings at Swensen's, the Western restaurant with a wide selection of hearty food, sundaes & ice cream cakes! Try signatures like Fish & Chips, Mac 'N' Cheese & locally-inspired Crab Meat Fried Rice! End your meal on a sweet note with Swensen's favorite sundaes like Sticky Chewy Chocolate or Banana Split!

properties.jcr:title: TEAHOUSE by Soup Restaurant
properties.shortdescription: At Teahouse by Soup Restaurant, they enliven the Samsui heritage by bringing you authentic Chinatown Heritage Cuisine. With their heirloom recipes, Signature Samsui Ginger Chicken, Chinatown family steamed dishes and richly flavored herbal soups, you're bound to have your heart full and stomach filled.

properties.jcr:title: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
properties.shortdescription: The oldest and largest specialty coffee and tea retailer in the United States

_rel_brandtenants_details.jcr:title: Wan Chai Hong Kong Tea Room

properties.shortdescription: Wan Chai HK Tea Room is an eatery that whips up a variety of fusion dishes. On top of Cantonese favourites & Hong Kong street eats, try the Baked Seafood Rice with Wasabi Cheese!

_rel_tenants_details.jcr:title: Wan Chai Hong Kong Tea Room

properties.jcr:title: Wan Chai Hong Kong Tea Room
White Restaurant
properties.shortdescription: White Restaurant’s The Original White Beehoon has became an iconic dish unique to Singapore. We strive to provide the best of affordable local dining to Singaporeans in a comfortable restaurant setting.

properties.jcr:title: Wok Hey
properties.shortdescription: If you like a good dish that brings out the heat and aroma of the wok, head down to the food kiosk Wok Hey, and experience the true stir fry with our signature Fried Rice, Ramen & Udon with your selection of toppings like Tobiko and Sous Vide Egg.

Serving humble fare of coffee, tea, egg & toast, Ya Kun Kaya Toast is a cafe that exemplifies how less is more. The bread is generously slathered with our special kaya recipe that's stood the test of time. Get your breakfast fix.
properties.jcr:title: Ya Kun Kaya Toast

properties.shortdescription: Yakiniku Shokudo
properties.jcr:title: Yakiniku Shokudo
